org.ldaptive.provider
Interface Provider<T extends ProviderConfig>

Type Parameters:
T - type of provider config for this provider
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApacheLdapProvider, JLdapProvider, JndiProvider, NetscapeProvider, OpenDJProvider, OpenDSProvider, UnboundIDProvider, UnboundIDSyncProvider
public interface Provider<T extends ProviderConfig>

Provides access to a provider specific connection factory.

Version:
$Revision: 2581 $ $Date: 2013-01-02 16:16:24 -0500 (Wed, 02 Jan 2013) $
Author:
Middleware Services
